channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache NuttX (incubating)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache NuttX (incubating)

item.title: CVE-2020-17528|2024-08-04T14:00:48.660Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20nuttx%20%28incubating%29
item.description: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability in TCP stack of Apache NuttX (incubating) versions up to and including 9.1.0 and 10.0.0 allows attacker to corrupt memory by supplying arbitrary urgent data pointer offsets within TCP packets including beyond the length of the packet.

item.title: CVE-2020-17529|2024-08-04T14:00:48.735Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20nuttx%20%28incubating%29
item.description: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability in TCP Stack of Apache NuttX (incubating) versions up to and including 9.1.0 and 10.0.0 allows attacker to corrupt memory by supplying and invalid fragmentation offset value specified in the IP header. This is only impacts builds with both CONFIG_EXPERIMENTAL and CONFIG_NET_TCP_REASSEMBLY build flags enabled.
